description: Near the Canade-USA border mont Gosford is at 1193 m. the 7th highest montain in Quebec. the trail is mostly in a mixed forest. On the summit we can see mont Megantic, the Appalachians and the White Montains.
directions: 901, rang Tout-de-JoieSt-Augustin de WoburnGOY IROhttp://www.montgosford.com/
title: Mont Gosford
